summary: This bill, the "Miccosukee Reserved Area Amendments Act," amends existing law to expand the Miccosukee Reserved Area (MRA) within Everglades National Park by adding the area known as Osceola Camp. In addition to expanding the reservation's land, the bill directs the Secretary of the Interior, in consultation with the Miccosukee Tribe, to implement measures to protect structures within Osceola Camp from flooding. These flood protection actions must be taken within two years of the bill's enactment, aiming to secure the community's land and infrastructure against environmental threats.
